commits.author: Kelvin Tan
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Add a string of character data, with XML escaping. * *

This is a convenience method that takes an XML * String, converts it to a character array, then invokes * {@link @see org.xml.sax.ContentHandler#characters}.

* * @param data The character data. * @exception org.xml.sax.SAXException If a filter * further down the chain raises an exception. * @see @see org.xml.sax.ContentHandler#characters */ public void characters (String data) throws SAXException { char ch[] = data.toCharArray(); characters(ch, 0, ch.length); }

commits.author: Kelvin Tan
commits.sourceOld:
/** * Add a string of character data, with XML escaping. * *

This is a convenience method that takes an XML * String, converts it to a character array, then invokes * {@link @see org.xml.sax.ContentHandler#characters}.

* * @param data The character data. * @exception org.xml.sax.SAXException If a filter * further down the chain raises an exception. * @see @see org.xml.sax.ContentHandler#characters */ public void characters (String data) throws SAXException { char ch[] = data.toCharArray(); characters(ch, 0, ch.length); }
